title: Because I'm sick of seeing this argument -
body:
"Rework" - to work again. This implies that something from the original work will be incorporated into the new design. 

"This is VGU" Yes. Visual. Gameplay. Update. Meaning the foundation for which we are updating is still there. Windows 10 is founded on Windows 7. League 7.4 is founded on League 1.0. Ok. 

Now ask yourselves, what is this rework founded on?

Us Galio mains expected changes, big chances. We're not new to league; we've been through Sion/Poppy/Warwick updates. However, you must understand our frustration when we look at this update and struggle to find some semblance of what we loved. 

Of course I'm still holding out to see everything in-game, and of course I'm still gonna play him and probably enjoy the new Galio. But it won't feel like a VGU. It most likely will be like playing a whole other champion. None of the elements I liked about the old guy is apparent at the moment.

Edit: Gatekeeper doing Galio's old dance did make me smile tho.

replies.body:
He kept his taunt, and he still has a wind blast in some form. So you get something.


Also, coulnd't you say that the reason gatekeeper galio is doing his old dance is because old galio is dead? :^)
Thank you. I try my best.
